title: Advanced Life Support (BLS) Virtual Simulation Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical knowledge and basic understanding of CPR (Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation) principles
context.additional_context: Simulation-based hands-on training through Virtual Learning Environment (VLE). Implementation of feedback systems centered on digital device utilization and formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can perform appropriate BLS procedures with 90% accuracy when responding to cardiac arrest scenarios in a virtual simulation environment.
Learners can apply decision-making processes in emergency situations through three or more PBL projects via team-based collaboration.
Learners can achieve 85% or higher mastery of BLS knowledge through simulation-based assessment items.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
